CustomField.description: Free text that shows any exceptions or conditions that apply when entitling the customer based on this contract. Information entered here is displayed on the Case Entitlement when this contract is used.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Define exceptions or conditions that apply when entitling the customer based on this contract. Information entered here is displayed on the Case Entitlement when this contract is used.
CustomField.label: Service Contract Notes
